ingredients.ingredient: ½ (10 ounce) jar Dickinson's® Lemon Curd, or any flavor Dickinson's Fruit or Creme Curd
Fruit slices, cookie pieces, candy sprinkles, chocolate shavings (optional)

cookingTips: Soften cream cheese at room temperature for 30 minutes for easier blending without lumps
Whip heavy cream to stiff peaks before folding into curd mixture for light, airy texture
Fill cups no more than 2 hours before serving to keep phyllo crisp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user create elegant no-bake dessert cups with minimal effort. Focus on proper whipping technique and last-minute assembly for textural contrast.
